purpose: Facilitate the development and deployment of knowledge-based question-answering systems using LLMs.
principle: Built on LLMs with capabilities like data processing, RAG retrieval, and visual AI workflow orchestration for efficient information retrieval and processing.
reusability: Offers plug-and-play components for data processing and retrieval, supports integration with various AI models and workflows.
limitations: Alpha status indicates potential stability issues; primarily targets users familiar with LLMs and AI workflows.
name: FastGPT
description: FastGPT is a knowledge-based platform built on the LLMs, offers a comprehensive suite of out-of-the-box capabilities such as data processing, RAG retrieval, and visual AI workflow orchestration, letting you easily develop and deploy complex question-answering systems without the need for extensive setup or configuration.
highlight: Comprehensive suite for developing and deploying complex question-answering systems with visual AI workflow orchestration.
